A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was as "Star Wars" a movie as they could have made. This movie advanced the plot\, had some brilliant character development\, and stunning visuals. 

At this point\, it's almost impossible to surprise me - but this movie had some fun surprises. 

Is it perfect? Of course not! But it's definitely better than all the prequels\, and it sets us up well for the 9th movie.

I've been a huge Star Wars fan/nerd for over 30 years - this met and exceeded all my expectations.
